titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4137) to amend and extend the Higher Education Act of 1965, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-523, by Ms. Sutton.

It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Education and Labor now printed in the bill. H. Res. 941 is laid upon the table.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 185.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 956.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 204 - 196 (Roll no. 32).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 214 - 190 (Roll no. 33).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/7/2008--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4137) to amend and extend the Higher Education Act of 1965.
